section_highlights.title: Introduction to IBM Cloud billing and usage
section_highlights.description: Learn about the {{site.data.keyword.cloud}} billing options and tools that you can use to track your usage and manage invoicing and payments.

section_highlights.title: Billing Model: Pay as You Go With Committed Use
section_highlights.description: You commit to spend a certain amount on IBM Cloud and you also receive discounts across the Cloud platform.

tiles.title: Cost analysis page
tiles.description: You can now compare your account's usage across months with the new cost analysis page in the billing and usage section of the console.

tiles.title: Selecting currency
tiles.description: The option to select local currency and USD is now available during IBM Cloud registration for users in Canada, United Kingdom/Ireland, Italy, Spain, France, Germany, Austria, Switzerland, Belgium, the Netherlands, Luxembourg, Denmark, Norway, Sweden, Finland, Australia, and New Zealand.

tiles.title: Exporting usage data
tiles.description: You can now export your usage data to a third party provider for visibility, optimization, governance and more across cloud environments.
